article_title: Oak Ridge teaching assistants unite in protest

article_metadata.description: Oak Ridge schools’ teaching assistants, united in protest, sat — and stood — through a lengthy city Board of Education meeting Monday night to voice their opposition to a proposal to outsource their jobs to a Nashville-based company.
article_metadata.author: Donna Smith/The Oak Ridger

og.description: Oak Ridge schools’ teaching assistants, united in protest, sat — and stood — through a lengthy city Board of Education meeting Monday
